name: pixie wings
notes:
a sweet little granny square to have fun with! pixie wings is a classic polly plum square in a tiny package.

pixie wings was designed as part of the [melange cal from underground crafter][1]. 
<hr>

this pattern pdf is totally free to you right here on ravelry. no account is needed to download the pdf - just click the "free ravelry download" link above.

<hr>

visit me, polly plum, get help or support, and stay up to date on new patterns by: [checking out my website][2], everytrickonthehook, for things like tutorials and free patterns; liking [every trick on the hook on facebook][3]; following [polly_plum_crochet on instagram][4]; visiting [pollyâ€™s place on ravelry][5]; or get lots of help and support from the facebook group, [polly plum pattern posse][6].

you can see all of my patterns on my [designer page on ravelry][7].
